title: Mysterious Loss of Account
body:
My friend somehow lost access to his account. Presumably, his account was hacked and his password was changed; the problem however, is that he can't remember the email he signed up with. 
We've tried scourging the internet, but can't find a way for him to get his account back without the email he signed up with (which again, he has NO idea what it is)
Are there options for account recovery in this situation? 

P.S. He does have knowledge of what skin/champions he did/didn't have, as well as what recent purchases were, account creation date, etc. if those things help at all. 
Thanks!

replies.body: While the original sign-up email is an important piece of info to help get your account back, it isn't 100% required.  Make sure to[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with as much information as possible and our Account Recovery Specialists should be able to get him his account back!
